title: Prognostic value of perioperative changes in serum primary metabolites in patients after major surgery under general anesthesia: an exploratory secondary analysis of the TAPIR trial.
abstract: Major surgery under general anesthesia substantially alters physiologic homeostasis. Nevertheless, the intricate effects on the metabolome are poorly studied. Metabolic fingerprints may allow the identification of patients at risk for unfavourable outcomes.
journal: Canadian journal of anaesthesia = Journal canadien d'anesthesie
